  <body class="d-body-bg d-body-text-color text-root min-w-base antialiased tracking-semitight d-scrollbar min-w-xs" data-n-head="%7B%22class%22:%7B%22ssr%22:%5B%22d-body-bg%20d-body-text-color%20text-root%20min-w-base%20antialiased%20tracking-semitight%20d-scrollbar%22,%22min-w-xs%22%5D%7D%7D">
    <script data-n-head="ssr" data-hid="nuxt-color-mode-script" data-pbody="true">!function(){"use strict";var t=window,e=document,s=e.documentElement,a=["dark","light"],o=window.localStorage.getItem("nuxt-color-mode")||"system",c="system"===o?n():o,e=e.body.getAttribute("data-color-mode-forced");function r(e){e=""+e;s.classList?s.classList.add(e):s.className+=" "+e}function l(e){return t.matchMedia("(prefers-color-scheme"+e+")")}function n(){if(t.matchMedia&&"not all"!==l("").media)for(var e of a)if(l(":"+e).matches)return e;return"light"}r(c=e?e:c),t.__NUXT_COLOR_MODE__={preference:o,value:c,getColorScheme:n,addClass:r,removeClass:function(e){e=""+e;s.classList?s.classList.remove(e):s.className=s.className.replace(new RegExp(e,"g"),"")}}}()</script><div data-server-rendered="true" id="__nuxt"><!----><div id="__layout"><div data-fetch-key="AppLayout:0" class="relative w-full"><div class="group flex items-center delay-200 h-10 bg-primary text-black"><p class="sm:top-1.5 w-full pl-4 sm:pl-0 sm:text-center text-sm font-medium">
    You are browsing Nuxt 2 docs. Go to <a href="https://nuxt.com" class="font-bold hover:underline">Nuxt 3 docs</a>,
    or learn more about <a href="/lts" class="font-bold hover:underline">Nuxt 2 Long Term Support</a>.
  </p></div> <header class="d-header-home"><div class="flex items-center h-full px-1 mx-auto max-w-7xl sm:px-3 lg:px-6"><button aria-label="mobileMenu" class="flex items-center transition-colors z-20"><div class="flex justify-center mb-16"><a href="/lts" class="flex items-center truncate bg-primary/25 hover:bg-primary-800 text-white border border-primary py-3 px-4 rounded"><svg width="16" Vue<br>Framework</h1> <h2 class="font-normal text-body-base xs:text-body-lg md:text-body-xl 2xl:text-body-2xl mb-8 px-8 sm:px-0 text-cloud-lighter">Build your Vue 2 application with confidence using Nuxt 2.<br class="hidden sm:block"> An open source framework making web development simple and powerful.</h2> <div class="flex flex-col sm:flex-row flex-wrap items-center justify-center space-y-3 sm:space-y-0 sm:space-x-3 xl:space-x-4"><a href="https://github.com/nuxt/nuxt" rel="noopener nofollow noreferrer" target="_blank" class="app-button text-white bg-sky-black hover:bg-sky-darker <div><img loading="lazy" src="/img/home/discover/modules/dark/landscape-discover-modules-t.svg" alt="A landscape image" class="absolute left-0 object-fill w-full h-40 -mt-24"> <section class="relative py-20 bg-sky-darkest text-white">  <div class="relative w-full d-container-content flex flex-col items-center">  <div class="flex flex-col w-full md:grid md:grid-cols-12"> <div class="flex flex-col w-full col-span-12 items-center jtext-center"> <div class="mb-2"><span class="text-tertiary font-bold text-lg">Learn</span></div> <div class="mb-2"><h2 class="font-normal text-center md:text-left font-serif text-display-6 md:text-display-5 2xl:text-display-4"><span class="text-primary">Easy</span> to learn. <span class="text-primary">Easy</span> to master</h2></div> <div class="mb-8"><p class="text-center font-normal text-body-base md:text-body-lg 2xl:text-body-xl">Learn everything you need to know, from beginner to master.</p></div> <div class="w-full my-8"><div class="w-full text-gray-50"><ul class="flex"><li><button class="relative mr-8 text-lg font-bold" data-v-911f294c><!----> 
        From CLI
        <!----> <!----></button></li> <li><button class="relative mr-8 text-lg font-bold" data-v-911f294c><!----> 
        From Scratch
        <!----> <!----></button></li></ul> <div class="mt-40 mb-40 lg:mt-0 lg:mb-0 w-full" style="height:300px"><div class="relative"><!----> <!----></div></div></div></div>   <div class="w-full self-start"><a href="/docs/get-started/installation" class="app-button app-button-primary-color medium" data-v-911f294c><!----> Start learning <!----> </a></div></div> </div> </div> </section> <img loading="lazy" src="/img/home/discover/modules/dark/landscape-discover-modules-b.svg" alt="A landscape image" class="absolute left-0 z-10 object-fill w-full h-40 -mt-20"></div>
<div class="relative sm:pb-20 lg:pb-28 xl:pb-40 2xl:pb-60"><img loading="lazy" src="/img/home/discover/dx/discover-mountain.svg" alt="A landscape image" class="absolute left-0 bottom-0 object-cover w-full"> <section class="py-40 bg-white text-secondary-black"><div class="relative w-full d-container-content flex flex-col items-center"><div class="flex flex-col w-full items-center col-span-12"><div class="mb-2"><span class="text-cloud font-bold text-lg">Features </span></div> <h2 class="font-normal text-center font-serif text-display-6 md:text-display-5 2xl:text-display-4 mb-2">Intuitive <span class="text-primary">D</span>eveloper E<span class="text-primary">x</span>perience</h2> <p class="font-normal text-center text-body-base md:text-body-lg 2xl:text-body-xl mb-12">Nuxt is shipped with plenty of features to boost developer productivity and the end user experience.</p> <div class="grid grid-cols-1 xs:grid-cols-2 md:grid-cols-3 lg:grid-cols-4"><div to="" aria-label="Zero Configuration" class="flex flex-col items-center transition duration-200 p-6 rounded-md"><span class="mb-4 transition duration-200 text-primary group-hover:text-primary-400"><img loading="lazy" src="/img/home/discover/dx/zero-config.svg" alt="A Zero Configuration image"></span> <h3 class="mb-1 text-center text-body-lg lg:text-body-xl font-bold">Zero Configuration</h3> <p class="text-center text-sm lg:text-base mb-4">Start coding your app right away, Nuxt takes care of the rest.</p></div><div to="" aria-label="File-system Routing" class="flex flex-col items-center transition duration-200 p-6 rounded-md"><span class="mb-4 transition duration-200 text-primary group-hover:text-primary-400"><img loading="lazy" src="/img/home/discover/dx/file-system-routing.svg" alt="A File-system Routing image"></span> <h3 class="mb-1 text-center text-body-lg lg:text-body-xl font-bold">File-system Routing</h3> <p class="text-center text-sm lg:text-base mb-4">Automatic routing and code-splitting for every page.</p></div><div to="" aria-label="Rendering Modes" class="flex flex-col items-center transition duration-200 p-6 rounded-md"><span class="mb-4 transition duration-200 text-primary group-hover:text-primary-400"><img loading="lazy" src="/img/home/discover/dx/hybrid.svg" alt="A Rendering Modes image"></span> <h3 class="mb-1 text-center text-body-lg lg:text-body-xl font-bold">Rendering Modes</h3> <p class="text-center text-sm lg:text-base mb-4">Switch between static-site generation or on-demand server rendering.</p></div><div to="" aria-label="Data Fetching" class="flex flex-col items-center transition duration-200 p-6 rounded-md"><span class="mb-4 transition duration-200 text-primary group-hover:text-primary-400"><img loading="lazy" src="/img/home/discover/dx/fetch.svg" alt="A Data Fetching image"></span> <h3 class="mb-1 text-center text-body-lg lg:text-body-xl font-bold">Data Fetching</h3> <p class="text-center text-sm lg:text-base mb-4">Fetch your content from any source in your Vue components, SSR ready.</p></div><div to="" aria-label="Strong Conventions" class="flex flex-col items-center transition duration-200 p-6 rounded-md"><span class="mb-4 transition duration-200 text-primary group-hover:text-primary-400"><img loading="lazy" src="/img/home/discover/dx/conventions.svg" alt="A Strong Conventions image"></span> <h3 class="mb-1 text-center text-body-lg lg:text-body-xl font-bold">Strong Conventions</h3> <p class="text-center text-sm lg:text-base mb-4">Efficient teamwork with a strong directory structure and conventions.</p></div><div to="" aria-label="SEO Friendly" class="flex flex-col items-center transition duration-200 p-6 rounded-md"><span class="mb-4 transition duration-200 text-primary group-hover:text-primary-400"><img loading="lazy" src="/img/home/discover/dx/seo.svg" alt="A SEO Friendly image"></span> <h3 class="mb-1 text-center text-body-lg lg:text-body-xl font-bold">SEO Friendly</h3> <p class="text-center text-sm lg:text-base mb-4">Meta tag management and faster time-to-content for great indexing.</p></div><div to="" aria-label="Components Auto-import" class="flex flex-col items-center transition duration-200 p-6 rounded-md"><span class="mb-4 transition duration-200 text-primary group-hover:text-primary-400"><img loading="lazy" src="/img/home/discover/dx/auto-inject.svg" alt="A Components Auto-import image"></span> <h3 class="mb-1 text-center text-body-lg lg:text-body-xl font-bold">Components Auto-import</h3> <p class="text-center text-sm lg:text-base mb-4">Use your components, Nuxt will import them with smart code-splitting.</p></div><div to="" aria-label="Modules Ecosystem" class="flex flex-col items-center transition duration-200 p-6 rounded-md"><span class="mb-4 transition duration-200 text-primary group-hover:text-primary-400"><img loading="lazy" src="/img/home/discover/dx/modular.svg" alt="A Modules Ecosystem image"></span> <h3 class="mb-1 text-center text-body-lg lg:text-body-xl font-bold">Modules Ecosystem</h3> <p class="text-center text-sm lg:text-base mb-4">Extend your app with 160+ Nuxt modules and create your own.</p></div></div></div></div></section></div>
<div data-fetch-key="HomeDiscoverPartners:0" class="relative pb-48 sm:pb-56 md:pb-64 lg:pb-72 xl:pb-92 2xl:pb-128 bg-sky-surface"><section class="relative pt-20 z-10"><div class="relative w-full d-container-content flex flex-col items-center xl:pt-10 text-sky-black"><div class="flex flex-col w-full items-center col-span-12"><div class="mb-2"><span class="text-cloud font-bold text-lg">Partners</span></div> <h2 class="font-normal font-serif text-center text-display-6 md:text-display-5 2xl:text-display-4 mb-2">Sustainable <span class="text-primary"><em data-v-bcc5fe40>Development</em></span></h2> <p class="font-normal text-center text-body-base md:text-body-lg 2xl:text-body-xl mb-8">Nuxt development is carried out by passionate developers, but the amount of effort needed to maintain and develop new features is not sustainable without proper financial backing. We are thankful for our sponsors and partners, who help make Nuxt possible.<br></p> <div class="grid grid-cols-1 sm:grid-cols-2 gap-8 md:px-16 pt-16 pb-24"><div class="flex flex-col space-y-4 items-center text-center"><img src="/img/partners/categories/technology.svg" alt="technology" class="w-12 h-12"> <h2 class="font-bold text-md md:text-lg">Technology partners</h2> <p class="text-sm md:text-base px-8 md:px-12 pb-2">Technology partners offer services that empower Nuxt developers, such as CMS, Hosting, Database, and more.</p> <a href="/partners#technology" aria-label="technology" class="app-button !border-sky-darker hover:text-sky-dark medium" data-v-911f294c><!----> Discover our technology partners <!----> </a></div><div class="flex flex-col space-y-4 items-center text-center"><img src="/img/partners/categories/agency.svg" alt="agency" class="w-12 h-12"> <h2 class="font-bold text-md md:text-lg">Agency partners</h2> <p class="text-sm md:text-base px-8 md:px-12 pb-2">Agency partners are trusted web and consulting agencies that can provide Nuxt development and support for your projects.</p> <a href="/partners#agency" aria-label="agency" class="app-button !border-sky-darker hover:text-sky-dark medium" data-v-911f294c><!----> Find a Nuxt expert <!----> </a></div></div> <p><a href="/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection#b4c4d5c6c0dad1c6c7f4dac1ccc0d8d5d6c79ad7dbd9" rel="noopener nofollow noreferrer" target="_blank" class="app-button app-button-primary-color medium" data-v-911f294c><!----> Become a partner <!----> </a></p></div></div></section> <img loading="lazy" src="/img/home/discover/partners/partners-illustration.svg" alt="A landscape image" class="absolute left-0 bottom-0 object-fill w-full -mt-28 sm:-mt-40 lg:-mt-60 xl:-mt-80"></div>
<section class="relative bg-secondary-black pt-18 sm:pt-20 md:pt-24 xl:pt-40"><div class="relative w-full d-container-content flex flex-col items-center text-white"><div class="flex flex-col w-full items-center col-span-12"><div class="mb-2"><span class="text-tertiary font-bold text-lg">Learn </span></div> <h2 class="font-normal font-serif text-display-6 md:text-display-5 2xl:text-display-4 mb-2">Follow our <span class="text-primary"><em data-v-bcc5fe40>Guides</em></span></h2> <p class="font-normal text-center text-body-base md:text-body-lg 2xl:text-body-xl mb-4 md:mb-12 text-white">From an idea to a masterpiece, guides take you on the path to becoming a Nuxter.</p> <div class="w-full md:my-8"><div class="grid grid-cols-2 sm:grid-cols-4 gap-6 md:gap-20 pb-8"><a href="/docs/get-started/installation" aria-label="Documentation" class="flex flex-col items-center transition duration-200 p-6 rounded-md hover:bg-sky-darker"><span class="mb-4 transition duration-200 text-primary group-hover:text-primary-400"><img loading="lazy" src="/img/home/learn/guides/gem-1.svg" alt="A Documentation image"></span> <h3 class="mb-1 text-center text-body-lg lg:text-body-xl font-bold">Documentation</h3> <p class="text-center text-sm lg:text-base mb-4">Discover Nuxt concepts and find a complete API reference.</p> </a><a href="/examples" aria-label="Examples" class="flex flex-col items-center transition duration-200 p-6 rounded-md hover:bg-sky-darker"><span class="mb-4 transition duration-200 text-primary group-hover:text-primary-400"><img loading="lazy" src="/img/home/learn/guides/gem-2.svg" alt="A Examples image"></span> <h3 class="mb-1 text-center text-body-lg lg:text-body-xl font-bold">Examples</h3> <p class="text-center text-sm lg:text-base mb-4">Learn by examples produced by the community.</p> </a><a href="/releases" aria-label="Releases" class="flex flex-col items-center transition duration-200 p-6 rounded-md hover:bg-sky-darker"><span class="mb-4 transition duration-200 text-primary group-hover:text-primary-400"><img loading="lazy" src="/img/home/learn/guides/gem-3.svg" alt="A Releases image"></span> <h3 class="mb-1 text-center text-body-lg lg:text-body-xl font-bold">Releases</h3> <p class="text-center text-sm lg:text-base mb-4">Find out what has changed before upgrading.</p> </a><a href="https://masteringnuxt.com/?utm_source=nuxt&utm_medium=link&utm_campaign=nsite" rel="noopener nofollow noreferrer" target="_blank" aria-label="Master Courses" class="flex flex-col items-center transition duration-200 p-6 rounded-md hover:bg-sky-darker"><span class="mb-4 transition duration-200 text-primary group-hover:text-primary-400"><img loading="lazy" src="/img/home/learn/guides/gem-4.svg" alt="A Master Courses image"></span> <h3 class="mb-1 text-center text-body-lg lg:text-body-xl font-bold">Master Courses</h3> <p class="text-center text-sm lg:text-base mb-4">Watch a complete series of videos to learn Nuxt with our partner Vue School.</p> </a></div></div></div></div></section>
<div class="relative pb-20 sm:pb-28 md:pb-36 lg:pb-48"><section class="relative z-10"><img loading="lazy" src="/img/home/explore/landscape-explore.svg" alt="A landscape image" class="left-0 bottom-0 object-cover w-full h-40 -mt-16"> <div class="relative w-full d-container-content flex flex-col items-center py-20 text-secondary-black"><div class="flex flex-col items-center w-full col-span-12"><div class="mb-2"><span class="text-cloud font-bold text-lg">Explore </span></div> <h2 class="mb-2 font-serif font-normal text-center text-display-6 md:text-display-5 2xl:text-display-4">Moving forward? So much to <span class="text-primary"><em data-v-bcc5fe40>Explore</em></span></h2> <p class="mb-12 font-normal text-center text-body-base md:text-body-lg 2xl:text-body-xl">Discover powerful modules, integrate with your favorite providers and start quickly with themes.</p> <div class="grid grid-cols-1 sm:grid-cols-3 gap-20 pb-8"><a href="/deployments" aria-label="Deployments" class="flex flex-col items-center transition duration-200 p-6 rounded-md hover:bg-sky-surface"><span class="mb-4 transition duration-200 text-primary group-hover:text-primary-400"><img loading="lazy" src="/img/home/explore/gem-explore-1.svg" alt="A Deployments image"></span> <h3 class="mb-1 text-center text-body-lg lg:text-body-xl font-bold">Deployments</h3> <p class="text-center text-sm lg:text-base mb-4">Extend and automate your workflow by using deployments for your favorite tools.</p> </a><a href="https://nuxt.com/modules" rel="noopener nofollow noreferrer" target="_blank" aria-label="Modules" class="flex flex-col items-center transition duration-200 p-6 rounded-md hover:bg-sky-surface"><span class="mb-4 transition duration-200 text-primary group-hover:text-primary-400"><img loading="lazy" src="/img/home/explore/gem-explore-2.svg" alt="A Modules image"></span> <h3 class="mb-1 text-center text-body-lg lg:text-body-xl font-bold">Modules</h3> <p class="text-center text-sm lg:text-base mb-4">Discover our list of modules to supercharge your Nuxt project. Created by the Nuxt team and community.</p> </a><a href="/themes" aria-label="Themes" class="flex flex-col items-center transition duration-200 p-6 rounded-md hover:bg-sky-surface"><span class="mb-4 transition duration-200 text-primary group-hover:text-primary-400"><img loading="lazy" src="/img/home/explore/gem-explore-3.svg" alt="A Themes image"></span> <h3 class="mb-1 text-center text-body-lg lg:text-body-xl font-bold">Themes</h3> <p class="text-center text-sm lg:text-base mb-4">See how a real world application is built using the Nuxt stack with the themes built by our partners.</p> </a></div></div></div></section> <img loading="lazy" src="/img/home/campfire/campfire-illustration-big.svg" alt="A landscape image" class="hidden xl:block absolute bottom-0 left-0 w-full object-fit"> <img loading="lazy" src="/img/home/campfire/campfire-illustration.svg" alt="A landscape image" class="absolute left-0 bottom-0 w-full object-fit xl:hidden"></div>
<section data-fetch-key="HomeCommunity:0" class="pb-20 pt-20 bg-sky-darker text-white"><div class="relative w-full d-container-content"><div class="flex flex-col items-center xl:items-start col-span-12"><div class="mb-2"><span class="text-primary font-bold text-lg">Community </span></div> <h2 class="mb-2 font-serif font-normal text-display-6 md:text-display-5 2xl:text-display-4">Sharing is <span class="text-sky-lighter">Caring</span></h2> <p class="mb-12 font-normal text-body-base md:text-body-lg 2xl:text-body-xl w-1/2 text-center xl:text-left">Discover articles from the framework team and community about Nuxt. Tips and tricks included!</p> <ul class="flex flex-col items-start grid grid-cols-1 sm:grid-cols-2 gap-8"><li><div><div class="aspect-w-16 aspect-h-8 bg-gray-100 overflow-hidden dark:bg-secondary-darker mb-4 rounded-lg"><img src="/_nuxt/image/b07ac2.jpeg" alt="Nuxt Static Improvements" loading="lazy" class="object-cover"></div> <span class="text-primary text-body-base lg:text-body-lg font-bold mb-2">Announcements</span> <h3 class="text-body-xl lg:text-body-2xl font-bold mb-2">Nuxt Static Improvements</h3> <p class="mb-4 text-body-base lg:text-body-lg truncate">With Nuxt version 2.13, the full-static mode has been introduced. In addition, a new command nuxt export was added to pre-render your pages without triggering a webpack build with the goal to separate the rendering and build process. The only issue was that most Nuxt users weren't able to unleash the full potential of the separation... until now.</p> <a href="/announcements/nuxt-static-improvements" class="relative inline-flex items-center font-bold group flex-nowrap max-w-max text-primary"><span class="text-lg">Get infos</span> <svg fill="none" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke="currentColor" class="ml-2 w-5 h-5"><path d="M9 5l7 7-7 7"></path></svg> <span class="absolute -bottom-2 h-0.5 w-8 group-hover:w-full transition-all bg-primary"></span> </a></div></li><li><div><div class="aspect-w-16 aspect-h-8 bg-gray-100 overflow-hidden dark:bg-secondary-darker mb-4 rounded-lg"><img src="/_nuxt/image/66fe59.jpg" alt="Building for the Edge with Nuxt 3 (live coding)" loading="lazy" class="object-cover"></div> <span class="text-primary text-body-base lg:text-body-lg font-bold mb-2">Events</span> <h3 class="text-body-xl lg:text-body-2xl font-bold mb-2">Building for the Edge with Nuxt 3 (live coding)</h3> <p class="mb-4 text-body-base lg:text-body-lg truncate">We'll take a tour of Nuxt 3, creating, building and deploying a real, live-coded app to a serverless environment. We'll talk about how changing requirements in today's serverless world require frameworks to change, and how that makes a difference for UX and performance.</p> <a href="https://conf.vuejs.de/talks/building-for-the-edge-with-nuxt-3/" rel="noopener nofollow noreferrer" target="_blank" class="relative inline-flex items-center font-bold group flex-nowrap max-w-max text-primary"><span class="text-lg">Get infos</span> <svg fill="none" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke="currentColor" class="ml-2 w-5 h-5"><path d="M9 5l7 7-7 7"></path></svg> <span class="absolute -bottom-2 h-0.5 w-8 group-hover:w-full transition-all bg-primary"></span> </a></div></li></ul></div></div></section>
<div class="relative pb-60 lg:pb-80 2xl:pb-102"><img loading="lazy" src="/img/home/home_footer.svg" alt="A landscape image" class="absolute left-0 bottom-0 object-cover w-full"> <section class="relative"> <img loading="lazy" src="/img/home/testimonials/landscape-community.svg" alt="A landscape image" class="w-full h-28 object-cover -mt-12 pointer-events-none"> <div class="relative w-full d-container-content flex flex-col items-center">  <div class="flex flex-col w-full md:grid md:grid-cols-12"> <div class="flex flex-col w-full col-span-12 pt-20 text-secondary-black items-center jtext-center"> <div class="mb-2"><span class="text-cloud font-bold text-lg">Community</span></div> <div class="mb-2"><h2 class="font-normal text-center md:text-left font-serif text-display-6 md:text-display-5 2xl:text-display-4">Testimonials</h2></div> <div class="mb-8"><p class="text-center font-normal text-body-base md:text-body-lg 2xl:text-body-xl">Learn what the experts love about Nuxt.</p></div> <div class="w-full my-8"><ul home="true" data-fetch-key="Testimonials:0" class="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 gap-12 md:gap-4 lg:gap-8 pb-8 px-4"><li class="relative flex flex-col items-center justify-between space-y-4 border-2 border-gray-200 md:transition-all md:ease-out rounded-lg p-4 bg-white"><p class="text-left">Nuxt offers a compelling solution and a great ecosystem to help you ship fullstack Vue apps that are performant and SEO friendly. The flexibility to choose between SSR and SSG is icing on the cake.</p> <div class="flex w-full justify-between items-center"><a href="https://twitter.com/youyuxi" rel="noopener" target="_blank"><img loading="lazy" src="/img/home/testimonials/evan.png" alt="Evan You" width="48" height="48" class="h-12 w-12"> </a> <a href="https://twitter.com/youyuxi" rel="noopener" target="_blank" class="flex flex-1 pl-4 text-left flex-col"><span class="font-bold text-base">Evan You</span> <span class="text-sm text-cloud">
          Creator of Vue.js
        </span> </a> <a href="https://vuejs.org" rel="noopener sponsored" target="_blank" class="hidden xl:block"><img loading="lazy" src="/img/home/testimonials/vue.svg" alt="vue" width="28" height="28"> <!----> </a></div></li><li class="relative flex flex-col items-center justify-between space-y-4 border-2 border-gray-200 md:transition-all md:ease-out rounded-lg p-4 bg-white"><p class="text-left">Nuxt has outstanding developer productivity, experience, and performance right out of the gate!<br>There’s so much attention to detail, ensuring teams have everything at their fingertips to productively build all manners of applications.</p> <div class="flex w-full justify-between items-center"><a href="https://twitter.com/sarah_edo" rel="noopener" target="_blank"><img loading="lazy" src="/img/home/testimonials/sarah.png" alt="Sarah Drasner" width="48" height="48" class="h-12 w-12"> </a> <a href="https://twitter.com/sarah_edo" rel="noopener" target="_blank" class="flex flex-1 pl-4 text-left flex-col"><span class="font-bold text-base">Sarah Drasner</span> <span class="text-sm text-cloud">
          Core Team of Vue.js
        </span> </a> <a href="https://vuejs.org" rel="noopener sponsored" target="_blank" class="hidden xl:block"><img loading="lazy" src="/img/home/testimonials/vue.svg" alt="vue" width="28" height="28"> <!----> </a></div></li><li class="relative flex flex-col items-center justify-between space-y-4 border-2 border-gray-200 md:transition-all md:ease-out rounded-lg p-4 bg-white"><p class="text-left">Nuxt is a fantastic choice for teams building a production-grade product on the web. It aims to bake in performance best-practices while maintaining excellent Vue.js DX.</p> <div class="flex w-full justify-between items-center"><a href="https://twitter.com/addyosmani" rel="noopener" target="_blank"><img loading="lazy" src="/img/home/testimonials/addy.png" alt="Addy Osmani" width="48" height="48" class="h-12 w-12"> </a> <a href="https://twitter.com/addyosmani" rel="noopener" target="_blank" class="flex flex-1 pl-4 text-left flex-col"><span class="font-bold text-base">Addy Osmani</span> <span class="text-sm text-cloud">
          Chief Engineer of Chrome
        </span> </a> <a href="https://www.google.com/chrome/" rel="noopener sponsored" target="_blank" class="hidden xl:block"><img loading="lazy" src="/img/home/testimonials/chrome.svg" alt="chrome" width="28" height="28"> <!----> </a></div></li><li class="relative flex flex-col items-center justify-between space-y-4 border-2 border-gray-200 md:transition-all md:ease-out rounded-lg p-4 bg-white"><p class="text-left">Nuxt has been an incredible source of innovation and inspiration for developers and framework authors alike. It’s been amazing to see its growth in web projects of all sizes on the web.</p> <div class="flex w-full justify-between items-center"><a href="https://twitter.com/rauchg" rel="noopener" target="_blank"><img loading="lazy" src="/img/home/testimonials/guillermo.png" alt="Guillermo Rauch" width="48" height="48" class="h-12 w-12"> </a> <a href="https://twitter.com/rauchg" rel="noopener" target="_blank" class="flex flex-1 pl-4 text-left flex-col"><span class="font-bold text-base">Guillermo Rauch</span> <span class="text-sm text-cloud">
          Founder of Vercel
        </span> </a> <a href="https://vercel.com" rel="noopener sponsored" target="_blank" class="hidden xl:block"><img loading="lazy" src="/img/home/testimonials/vercel-light.svg" alt="vercel-light" width="28" height="28" class="light-img"> <!----> </a></div></li><li class="relative flex flex-col items-center justify-between space-y-4 border-2 border-gray-200 md:transition-all md:ease-out rounded-lg p-4 bg-white"><p class="text-left">Nuxt has a unique approach of combining a great developer experience with reusable, fully integrated features that speed up the development and performance of your next website or application.</p> <div class="flex w-full justify-between items-center"><a href="https://twitter.com/domangerer" rel="noopener" target="_blank"><img loading="lazy" src="/img/home/testimonials/dominik.png" alt="Dominik Angerer" width="48" height="48" class="h-12 w-12"> </a> <a href="https://twitter.com/domangerer" rel="noopener" target="_blank" class="flex flex-1 pl-4 text-left flex-col"><span class="font-bold text-base">Dominik Angerer</span> <span class="text-sm text-cloud">
          Founder of Storyblok
        </span> </a> <a href="https://www.storyblok.com" rel="noopener sponsored" target="_blank" class="hidden xl:block"><img loading="lazy" src="/img/home/testimonials/storyblok.svg" alt="storyblok" width="28" height="28"> <!----> </a></div></li><li class="relative flex flex-col items-center justify-between space-y-4 border-2 border-gray-200 md:transition-all md:ease-out rounded-lg p-4 bg-white"><p class="text-left">Nuxt is our primary choice for offering a seamless website development experience to our users. Its simplicity and progressive learning curve makes it our ideal choice for SliceMachine.</p> <div class="flex w-full justify-between items-center"><a href="https://twitter.com/Sadache" rel="noopener" target="_blank"><img loading="lazy" src="/img/home/testimonials/sadek.png" alt="Sadek Drobi" width="48" height="48" class="h-12 w-12"> </a> <a href="https://twitter.com/Sadache" rel="noopener" target="_blank" class="flex flex-1 pl-4 text-left flex-col"><span class="font-bold text-base">Sadek Drobi</span> <span class="text-sm text-cloud">
          Founder of Prismic
        </span> </a> <a href="https://prismic.io" rel="noopener sponsored" target="_blank" class="hidden xl:block"><img loading="lazy" src="/img/home/testimonials/prismic.svg" alt="prismic" width="28" height="28"> <!----> </a></div></li><li class="relative flex flex-col items-center justify-between space-y-4 border-2 border-gray-200 md:transition-all md:ease-out rounded-lg p-4 bg-white"><p class="text-left">Every serious full stack development team needs to stop take a look at Nuxt. Vue's developer productivity combined with Nuxt's server side rendering, is the foundation for instant loading web sites that delight users and improve team velocity.</p> <div class="flex w-full justify-between items-center"><a href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ajaykapur/" rel="noopener" target="_blank"><img loading="lazy" src="/img/home/testimonials/ajay.png" alt="Ajay Kapur" width="48" height="48" class="h-12 w-12"> </a> <a href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ajaykapur/" rel="noopener" target="_blank" class="flex flex-1 pl-4 text-left flex-col"><span class="font-bold text-base">Ajay Kapur</span> <span class="text-sm text-cloud">
          Founder of Layer0
        </span> </a> <a href="https://www.layer0.co/" rel="noopener sponsored" target="_blank" class="hidden xl:block"><img loading="lazy" src="/img/home/testimonials/layer0-light.svg" alt="layer0-light" width="28" height="28" class="light-img"> <!----> </a></div></li><li class="relative flex flex-col items-center justify-between space-y-4 border-2 border-gray-200 md:transition-all md:ease-out rounded-lg p-4 bg-white"><p class="text-left">Nuxt has an ideal balance of approachability for developers new to JAMstack, and power for experienced teams working on complex applications. The modules and first-class integration with the rest of the Vue ecosystem makes for a superb DX.</p> <div class="flex w-full justify-between items-center"><a href="https://twitter.com/paper_tokyo" rel="noopener" target="_blank"><img loading="lazy" src="/img/home/testimonials/dave.png" alt="Dave Loneragan" width="48" height="48" class="h-12 w-12"> </a> <a href="https://twitter.com/paper_tokyo" rel="noopener" target="_blank" class="flex flex-1 pl-4 text-left flex-col"><span class="font-bold text-base">Dave Loneragan</span> <span class="text-sm text-cloud">
          Co-founder of Swell
        </span> </a> <a href="https://swell.is" rel="noopener sponsored" target="_blank" class="hidden xl:block"><img loading="lazy" src="/img/home/testimonials/swell.svg" alt="swell" width="28" height="28"> <!----> </a></div></li><li class="relative flex flex-col items-center justify-between space-y-4 border-2 border-gray-200 md:transition-all md:ease-out rounded-lg p-4 bg-white"><p class="text-left">The moment I used Nuxt for the first time I felt in love with it. Apart from its scalability, performance and developer experience, the team behind of it is also fantastic. Thanks for developing such a great framework and making our lives much easier!</p> <div class="flex w-full justify-between items-center"><a href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/savas-vedova/" rel="noopener" target="_blank"><img loading="lazy" src="/img/home/testimonials/savas.png" alt="Savas Vedova" width="48" height="48" class="h-12 w-12"> </a> <a href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/savas-vedova/" rel="noopener" target="_blank" class="flex flex-1 pl-4 text-left flex-col"><span class="font-bold text-base">Savas Vedova</span> <span class="text-sm text-cloud">
          Founder of Stormkit
        </span> </a> <a href="https://www.stormkit.io/" rel="noopener sponsored" target="_blank" class="hidden xl:block"><img loading="lazy" src="/img/home/testimonials/stormkit.svg" alt="stormkit" width="28" height="28"> <!----> </a></div></li></ul></div>   </div> </div> </div> </section></div></div></div></div> <footer aria-label="footerHeading" class="relative z-10"><div class="select-none absolute bottom-full w-full"><!----> <!----></div> <div class="bg-secondary-darker"><div class="max-w-7xl mx-auto py-12 px-4 sm:px-6 lg:py-16 lg:px-8 grid gap-8 lg:gap-0 sm:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-4"><div><h3 class="font-semibold text-lg text-cloud-light">
